(I am not affiliated in any way)

Hi, everyone!
I am Abhishek Zinta, a full-stack developer with 5.6 years of experience, seeking a full-time remote position. Here's a quick snapshot of my expertise below:

My Skills:
*Front End:*
HTML
CSS
JavaScript
React.js

*Back End:*
PHP - Laravel
Node.js
Adobe ColdFusion

*API’s:*
Custom REST API Development and Integrations

*HubSpot Expertise:*

Hubl
HubSpot CMS & CRM
Custom theme & module development
Custom App Development in HubSpot
Workflows & third-party integration

Other
Managing marketing workflows and integrations
Building seamless user experiences using custom solutions

Honestly, I can assure you that working with me will deliver the best outcomes and a great collaborative experience. As a team-oriented professional, I’m genuinely passionate about creating impactful and meaningful solutions.

Let's discuss some opportunities, and I would love to connect with you for an interview. You can reach me here or DM me if you think I'll be a great fit for your team!

Look forward to hearing from you.
<mailto:geek.abhishekzinta@gmail.com|geek.abhishekzinta@gmail.com>

I’m looking for a JavaScript developer skilled in PDF generation for a long-term position.
Please direct message me if you’re interested.
